definition.script: pipeline { agent any; stages { stage("Download") { steps { sh 'rm -r -f /project-${totoMSname}' ; sh 'git clone https://github.com/nicolasances/${totoMSname}.git /project-${totoMSname}'; }}; stage("Build Docker Image") {steps { dir('/project-${totoMSname}/${totoMSname}') { sh 'docker build -t ${totoMSname} .'; }}}; stage("Deploy") {steps { sh 'docker stop ${totoMSname} || true' ; sh 'docker rm ${totoMSname} || true' ; sh 'docker run -d --network totonet --name ${totoMSname} ${totoMSname}'; }};}}
